item.title: Web Scraping
item.description: Unfortunately, not all data is contained within neat dataframes. Much of the freely accessible data out there is posted on webpages. This post will serve as an introduction on how to extract that data using two packages: rvest and rselenium. Setup CSS Tool Webpages are not written in R code. They are written in HTML and CSS. A working knowledge of at least CSS is required to use the webscapring packages R provides.
